features.1: Developing IoT-enabled apps using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and React Native.
features.2: Building Android apps and micro front-ends, incorporating libraries like react-pdf.
features.3: Implementing testing with Jest and adhering to best practices (SOLID, DRY, KISS, clean code).
features.4: Working within a development team of 10+ members, focusing on scalable and maintainable code.
